s: March 7, 2025 - I may be a beauty editor but—on the down low—I wasn't a fan of fragrances until maybe last year. While my collection is small, I've found myself connecting with a handful of indie brands that have amassed a devoted fanbase, and the one I've grown to love the most is Phlur.
